name: DBLR Red Wine Blend
description: Donnaâ€™s Big Lip Red is a 2007 red wine blend consisting of 67% Petite Verdot and 33% Cabernet Franc from Mendocino County. Handcrafted in small open top fermenters and aged one year in French oak barrels. This wine offers up intense aromas of blackberry, ripe plum and sweet toasty oak. The flavors are delicate yet rich with cassis, blackcherry caramel, vanilla and spice. The rich fruit is perfectly framed by the oak and the soft lingering texture on the palate adds to the sensory experience. It's a fantastically balanced wine, and we endorse and recommend it enthusiastically! DBLR is produced by Trish's winemaker brother-in-law, and you can find more information (including how to order it) by clicking on the image below. To order, click the image above, NOT the "Add to Cart" below.

name: Kalita Pelican Pot 1L
description: Just added to our North American distribution list! The Pelican Pot is a 1.0 liter pourover drip pot with a unique style. Rather than the bare metal you may be used to seeing, the Pelican Pot is layered in enamel. White or red on the outside, and a speckled dark on the inside, much like you might find on camping cookware, but designed specifically for pourover drip coffee brewing. Though it does not indicate it anywhere, these pots ARE induction compatible (we made sure). With a similar spout to the venerable Wave Pot, the Pelican Pot is a great addition to your pourover coffee setup, whether it's replacing an existing water pot or if it's your first one. In either case, we're happy to be bringing this to you! Part Number: 52125 (white) or 52123 (red) Volume: 1.0 liter Material: steel with enameled finish Weight: 1 lb 7 oz. (660g) Induction compatible: Yes IN STOCK (NOTE: The gold pelican label in the images is a removable sticker)

name: SHOWRUNNER Espresso
description:
Gotta tell ya, we really love television, and we named this espresso blend "SHOWRUNNER Espresso" both as a tribute and as inspiration. For us coffee people, the idea of a showrunner, but for coffee, might cause us to reexamine the way we approach our craft. We could go on for pages about this, but for now, let's leave it at that. As for this particular espresso blend, we hope you'll find it worthy of repeat visits, and that you might "get" what we mean with it. Sweet, balance, clean... you'll hear this mantra from us over and over with all of our coffees, but expressed through this particular coffee blend with one component from Guatemala and one from Ethiopia, it's the way the fruity flavors come through that puts a unique spin on a classic tale. You'll know the barista nailed it when it rolls sweetly in your mouth, bursting with candied-fruit flavors, and an aftertaste that tapers into a clean finish. As always, our espresso blend is designed for espresso brewing but still make for a nice, rich cup when brewed as a traditional filter brew. Bourbon, caturra, and Ethiopian heirloom varieties, fully-washed process 16 oz (454g) whole bean coffee

See "Roasting Schedule" for more information.

name: Kalita Wave 'Style Set'
description: An attractive way to brew and serve via the Kalita Wave brewing dynamic, the "Wave Style Set" is a dripper and flask combination set that looks great on the coffeebar and the table. From the heat-resistant tempered glass flask and dripper (uses #185 size Kalita Wave filters), to the steel cage that keeps the dripper suspended in the flask, to the plastic grip, the 'Wave Style Set' performs everything we love about the Wave Series coffee drippers, in a classic but modern form factor. *This set includes brown #185 filters, but we highly suggest you use white filters. No. 35159 : Kalita Wave Style Set Weight: 1.5 lbs (660 g) OUT OF STOCK (more info soon)

name: Kalita Glass Servers
description: The 300G and 500G straight-sided glass servers, and BG-185 rounded glass server, are all made from heat-resistant tempered glass and are an ideal companion to your coffee pourover dripper or tea service set. With gradiations up to 500 mL (300mL for the 300G), these tempered glass coffee servers work as well on the stove as they do at the table. Often paired with our Wave Drippers, these all-glass (lids are black molded plastic*) servers are durable, dishwasher-safe, and attractive. No. 31253 : Kalita 300G server Weight: 8.47 oz (240 g) IN STOCK No. 31255 : Kalita 500G server Weight: 11.1 oz (315 g) SOLD OUT

name: Kalita Wave Filters
description: A coffee filter is more than just something to keep grinds out of your drink, it is an important part of the brewing process. The Wave filters are not only an optimized shape, but made from the highest-grade filter paper we've come across. NOTE: Make sure you're buying the right filter for your dripper! #185 filters for #185 drippers, #155 filters for #155 drippers! No. 22199 : Kalita #185 Wave WHITE filters 100 per package IN STOCK No. 22201 : Kalita #155 Wave WHITE filters 100 per package IN STOCK **Filter packages are not returnable unless unopened**

name: Kalita Premium 'Shop Filters'
description: Finally. A freakin' paper coffee filter that doesn't add unwanted paper taste! Kalita makes four different grades of paper filters, and these are the top of the line. The Kohiyasan 'Coffee Shop' line is the cleanest, heaviest paper filter we've ever encountered in the popular "truncated cone" shape. These are 17% heavier than Melitta and 24% heavier than Filtropa, while still being the cleanest paper filter we've found. Yes, we've been taste-testing coffee filters. The heavier paper promotes a slower brew-flow, encouraging better extraction and ultimately a sweeter, well-developed brew. The quality of the paper is such that without a pre-rinse, these filters impart less paper-filter taste than most filters WITH a pre-rinse. No. 13157 : Kalita Shop Filter 102 White (box of 40) No. 13165 : Kalita Shop Filter 102 White (box of 100) No. 15123 : Kalita Shop Filter 103 White (box of 40) No. 15127 : Kalita Shop Filter 103 White (box of 100) Size 102 is the same as Melitta #2. Great for Beehouse, Melitta, and similar. Size 103 is the same size as Melitta #4. Great for Clever Coffee Dripper, Technivorm Moccamaster, etc. Compatible with these and many other manual and auto-drip brewing devices.

name: Kalita Wave #155 Coffee Drippers
description: The Wave Series from Kalita is the premier coffee dripper available on the market. The flat-bottom coffee bed geometry, patented "Wave" filter, and three-hole design work together to provide an even extraction that makes brewing a perfect cup accessible and easy. Brew directly into a cup, or mount it on a brew stand (like a TruBru). This 155-size Wave dripper is optimized for brewing a single-serving of brewed coffee. We recommend this dripper for about 18-24 grams of coffee, yielding 12-16 fl oz of brew. **FILTERS NOT INCLUDED! DON'T FORGET THE FILTERS!** No. 04021 : Kalita Wave #155 Stainless Steel Coffee Dripper Dishwasher safe stainless steel Weight: 2.9 oz (82 g) IN STOCK No. 05045 : Kalita Wave #155 Glass Coffee Dripper Dishwasher safe glass & plastic collar Weight: 4.7 oz (134 g) IN STOCK Don't forget the filters! Watch this video to learn more about the Kalita Wave Series:

name: Kalita Wave Pot 1L
description: Our absolute favorite pourover drip pot we've come across, the Wave Pot from Kalita is made from polished stainless steel with wood handle and lid accent. Unlike the very thin spouts on other pouring kettles, the Wave Pot allows you unparalleled control over your pour; even compared to other "dragon-neck" kettles, due to its sharply pinched lip. The tapered neck reduces the "siphon effect" that increases unwanted velocity of water out of the spout. The wood handle (removable for use in a dishwasher) is comfortable to hold and is protected from the hot kettle water. The kettle's design is intended to complement the Wave Stainless coffee dripper. Part Number: 52073 Volume: 1.0 liter Material: 18-8 stainless steel with wood accents Weight: 1 lb 5 oz. (600g) Induction compatible: Yes SOLD OUT (More expected early December)

name: Wrecking Ball Coffee Subscriptions
description:
At the interval you choose (monthly, twice a month, or weekly), we will roast and ship you a bag of coffee automatically that we're especially loving at that moment. Cancel at any time. Shipments will continue until you cancel via your PayPal account. It's easy! Coffees will be whole-bean, roasted and shipped within hours, and will be designed for filter brewing (drip, press, etc.) or espresso (extra charge). Filter roasts are 12 ounces (net weight) of coffee, while espresso roasts are 16 ounces. Sorry, US addresses only! Please use one of the SUBSCRIBE buttons below. Paypal will charge you once at the indicated interval (monthly or weekly), and you can cancel at any time: $19 per filter coffee ($4 extra for espresso), includes USPS Priority shipping & handling. Deliveries will usually arrive within 2-3 days from roast. Thanks, and we'll get some delicious coffees ready for you! Love, Trish & Nick
P.S. For gift subscriptions, scroll all the way down to the bottom of this page.
Monthly subscription
One coffee (select filter or espresso) sent once per month.


Twice monthly subscription
Two coffees (select filter or espresso) sent per month (one coffee about every two or three weeks)


Weekly subscription
One coffee (select filter or espresso) sent each week.


6-Month Gift Subscription
As seen in Real Simple Magazine and elsewhere, our subscriptions make great gifts for any occasion. Birthdays, weddings, anniversaries... it's a perfect and special gift for any coffee lover, or if you want a special and unique gift but can't deliver it in person.
Use the drop-down menu below to select which type (filter roasts or espresso roasts) you'd like them to receive. There's an extra charge for gift-boxing.


All amounts in US dollars. Subscriptions will continue until and unless you cancel it via PayPal (except gift subscriptions, which are paid in advance). You should receive a confirmation email from PayPal when you're charged, and another when your coffee ships (each Tuesday).

name: Kalita Wave #185 Drippers
description: The Wave Series from Kalita is the premier coffee dripper available on the market. The flat-bottom coffee bed geometry, patented "Wave" filter, and three-hole design work together to provide an even extraction that makes brewing a perfect cup accessible and easy. Brew directly into a cup, or mount it on a brew stand (like a TruBru). We recommend this size (#185) for brewing about 26-45 grams of coffee, yielding between 16 and 26 ounces of brewed coffee. Available in three styles: stainless steel, glass, and ceramic. **FILTERS NOT INCLUDED! DON'T FORGET THE FILTERS!** No. 05033 : Kalita #185 Wave Stainless Steel Dripper Dishwasher safe stainless steel Weight: 5.6 oz (160 g) IN STOCK No. 05039 : Kalita #185 Wave Glass Dripper Dishwasher safe tempered glass Weight: 6.8 oz (194 g) IN STOCK No. 02035 : Kalita #185 Wave Ceramic Dripper Dishwasher safe ceramic Weight: 14.0 oz (398 g) IN STOCK - Limited Quantity Don't forget the filters! Watch this video to learn more about the Kalita Wave Series: (dripper only. no filters, server, or cup included)

name: Kantan Drip Single-Use Coffee Drippers (30-pk)
description: These will blow your mother-lovin' mind! The Kantan Drip is a single-use dripper-and-filter in one! Fold down the sides, open the filter "pouch," add up to 16g of coffee, place it on a cup, and start brewing! The flat-bottomed box-shaped coffee bed promotes even extraction, while the size and orientation promotes an optimal brew time. Each package contains 30 drippers, each 3.5 x 5 inches (12.8 x 8.7 cm) No. 08029 : Kalita Kantan Drip (30-pk sleeve) FYI, for multiple quantities, there are 6 sleeves per box. Watch this video to learn more about these thingies:
